title: secure login authentication
description: Test the login endpoint to ensure users can authenticate successfully with valid credentials and receive a session-based cookie for subsequent requests.

title: role based access control enforcement
description: Verify that the system restricts or grants access to endpoints based on user roles such as supervisor, picker, verifier, and counter attendant.

title: order status workflow transitions
description: Validate that order status transitions follow the defined workflow states from pending to finalized without skipping any steps.

title: work unit locking and concurrency control
description: Test that work units are locked when assigned to a user and that concurrent access by multiple users is prevented.

title: audit log creation for critical actions
description: Ensure that all critical actions such as user logins, order updates, and unlocks are logged with user identity, timestamps, and details of changes.

title: barcode scanning product validation
description: Verify that barcode scanning integration correctly validates product items during picking and verification processes.

title: exception recording for damaged or missing items
description: Test the recording of exceptions such as damaged, missing, or expired items during order processing and ensure they are associated with the correct orders.

title: supervisor user management crud
description: Validate that supervisors can create, update, and delete users through the user management endpoints.

title: supervisor forced unlock functionality
description: Test that supervisors can perform forced unlocks on locked work units to resolve conflicts or errors.

title: session based logout and session check
description: Verify that users can logout successfully and that session checks correctly identify active or expired sessions.
